Name: Label
Description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.

SubComponents.Name: Root
SubComponents.Description: Contains the content for the label.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

Props.Name: htmlFor
Props.Description: The id of the element the label is associated with.
